nodeList.nodeDescription:
Summons a primal raptor that ferociously attacks your enemies. When its health drops to 0 it is downed, and you can stand near it to revive it.

The raptor counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.

nodeList.description: Your Raptor has additional elemental resistance and have additional dodge chance.
nodeList.nodeDescription: +[80] Elemental protection and dodge rating per point.

node.nodeDescription:
Summons a primal raptor that ferociously attacks your enemies. When its health drops to 0 it is downed, and you can stand near it to revive it.

The raptor counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.

nodeList.description: {Screech} is more effective.
nodeList.nodeDescription: [10%] Increased screech effectiveness per point.

node.altText: Physical Resistance Shred reduces Physical Resistance bt 5% (2% against bosses and players), lasts 4 seconds, and can stack up to 20 times.
node.description: Your Raptor gains the ability to {Screech} at enemies, shredding their physical resistance for 4 seconds. 10 second cooldown.
node.nodeDescription: Raptor gains the ability to screech at targets, shredding their armour and increasing the melee damage they take. 10s cooldown.

node.description: Your Raptor has additional elemental resistance and have additional dodge chance.
node.nodeDescription: +[80] Elemental protection and dodge rating per point.

Summons a primal raptor that ferociously attacks your enemies. When its health drops to 0 it is downed, and you can stand near it to revive it.

The raptor counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.

nodeList.description: Your Raptor automatically reduces the cooldown of your other companions' activatable abilities by 3 seconds. This effect has an 8 second cooldown.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Raptor reduces the cooldowns of your other companions' activatable abilities by 3s automatically every 8 seconds.

node.description: Your Raptor has additional elemental resistance and have additional dodge chance.
node.nodeDescription: +[80] Elemental protection and dodge rating per point.

nodeList.altText: Using a town portal will reset this buff even if you return to the same zone.
nodeList.description: If your Raptor has 10 kills in this zone it evolves, gaining 15% more size and damage while you remain in the zone (damage multiplicative with other modifiers).
nodeList.nodeDescription: If your raptor has 10 kills in this zone. It evolves gaining 15% more size and damage, while you remain in that zone.
